wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Richardson (1830 – 25 September 1902) was a Liberal Party politician in England.

response: * Joseph Richardson (American politician) (1778–1871), United States Representative from Massachusetts
* Joseph Richardson (Liberal politician) (1830–1902), Liberal Party politician in England, MP for South East Durham in the 1890s
* Joseph Richardson (1755–1803), journalist, poet and MP for Newport, Cornwall 1796–1803
